code: export var Mention=function Mention(text){var regex=/\B@[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+/gm;return text=text.replace(regex,function(match){return"").concat(match,"");});};export var MentionFilter=function MentionFilter(text,username){var matchingText=text.match(/\B@[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+/gm);var parse=matchingText?matchingText.map(function(val){return val.replace("@","");}):[];if(username)parse.push(username);return parse;};
